descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=4][i]This Mod is [color=#b6d7a8]Standalone[/color].
Add the following changes to[/i] [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Uthgerd_the_Unbroken]Uthgerd the Unbroken[/url].[i]
[/i][size=2][i]Face change.[/i]
[i]Add the flag of[/i] "Protected".
[i]Add sleep AI Package.[/i]
[i]Learned some of the Perk.[/i][/size][size=2]
[/size][/size][/size][size=3][size=2][i]Class change[/i] "CombatWarrior1H" → "CombatWarrior2H".
[i]Default outfit will be clothes.[/i][/size]


■Required Mods
None


■Recommended Mods[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589]Natural Eyes[/url]
[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73853/]PureSkinTexture[/url] to v3[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url][/size][size=3] [size=2]to v2[/size][/size][size=3]

■Credits
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit
[/url][/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url][/size]
author: chao
